ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera Body + <2> Canon EF-S 55-250mm STM Lens + <3> Canon 2400 DSLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <6> Battery Charger for LP-E6 +
<7> PD 58mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <9> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <10> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<11> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <14> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera Body with 55-250mm IS STM Lens + 64GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery/Charger + Tripod Kit
